overview: A Perfect Song is the story about an introverted character named Lloyd, who believes that if he rejects the vanities and luxuries of the world, God will give him the supernatural ability to compose a song that can cure all of the world’s diseases.  ‘A Perfect Song’ was written, produced, and directed by Billy Yeager. Yeager also composed all the music, and performed the role of Lloyd and Lloyd's brother.
title: A Perfect Song
